# Railroad Blocks
![A screenshot of Minecraft with a Railroad Crossing sign, a street, and some trees in the background. The text "Railroad Blocks" is displayed across the image.](https://wsrv.nl/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fuser-images.githubusercontent.com%2F72585301%2F162553408-f6b9f69a-90e4-493c-a72f-1f7e793d3c7b.png&n=-1)
This mod adds various railroad-themed blocks to Minecraft.
The current version includes the following blocks:
* Iron Crossbuck
* Iron Pole
* Railroad Crossing Advance Warning Sign
* Whistle Sign
* Wooden Crossbuck
* Wooden Pole

And the following items:
* Green Flag
* Yellow Flag
* Red Flag
* Blue Flag

Please note this is an early version of this mod. Not all features/blocks have been added yet.

# Download Locations
You can download Railroad Blocks at any of the following locations:
- [Modrinth](https://modrinth.com/mod/railroad-blocks)
- [CurseForge (Fabric)](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/railroad-blocks)
- [CurseForge (Forge/NeoForge)](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/railroad-blocks-forge)
- [GitHub](https://github.com/SamTheGamer39/MinecraftRailroadBlocks/releases)

![](https://img.shields.io/badge/dynamic/json?labelColor=black&color=grey&label=&suffix=%20downloads&query=downloads&url=https://api.modrinth.com/v2/project/sTmgisaB&style=flat&logo=data:image/png;base64,)
![](https://cf.way2muchnoise.eu/606729.svg)
![](https://cf.way2muchnoise.eu/684961.svg)

## Mod Loaders
Railroad Blocks currently supports the following Mod Loaders:
- Fabric
- Forge
- NeoForge (Beta)
